description.value: This rose-gold ring is adorned in the center by a somewhat ominous-looking horned skull. This ring gives you the power to cast the following innate arcane cantrips any number of times each day: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Detect Magic]{Detect Magic}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Mage Hand]{Mage Hand}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Prestidigitation]{Prestidigitation}. Each is cast as a 1st-level spell. If you are an arcane spellcaster, these can instead be heightened to the level of your cantrips.

source.value: Pathfinder Adventure: The Fall of Plaguestone
